subtitleNullable: Demographics, Injury Severity, Location, and Other Factors
descriptionNullable:
_____
# Traffic Accidents in Arizona
### Demographics, Injury Severity, Location, and Other Factors
By Sarah Cohen [[source]](https://data.world/sarahcnyt)
_____

### About this dataset
> The Arizona fatal accidents dataset contains detailed information on 3,904 fatal car accidents that occurred in the state of Arizona between. The dataset has been parsed to include only the essential data points, such as location, time, weather, contributing factors and demographic information of the motorists involved in the accident. Using this data, researchers can gain valuable insights into automobile safety trends in the Grand Canyon state.
> 
> The dataset consists of three files - AZ_ACCIDENT (79 columns with 3,904 accidents), AZ_VEHICLE (131 columns with 5,889 vehicles) and AZ_PERSON (96 columns with 10,611 people). It includes translated fields for easy interpretation alongside numerical codes for greater detail about each variable. For example there is WEATHER as a numeric code and WEATHER_LIT as its literal translation. Additionally relevant indicators from auxiliary files are included such as whether a police pursuit was involved or whether a pedestrian was involved or killed. However it does not include every piece of information – some more arcane fields were not translated nor included in the set such as road use classifications from 2015 NHTSA changes– so advanced queries may be difficult to perform depending on what is needed out of this data set. 
> 
> Overall this set is great for those looking to gain an understanding of fatal car accident trends in Arizona during its most recent 5 year window but be aware it might require extra effort when performing complex query operations due to exclusions made by NHTSA due either technical difficulty or intentional removal

### More Datasets
> For more datasets, click [here](https://www.kaggle.com/thedevastator/datasets).

### Featured Notebooks
> - 🚨 **Your notebook can be here!** 🚨! 

### How to use the dataset
> This dataset provides detailed information on fatal traffic accidents in Arizona from 2012-2016. It contains three files that provide information about the state of Arizona, the people involved in fatal accidents and the vehicles involved in those accidents. This guide will help you utilize this dataset to better understand and explore the data so that you can draw meaningful insights from it. 
> 

### Research Ideas
> - Using the geographic data to map out locations of fatal accidents in Arizona, and creating an interactive heat map to help identify the highest risk areas for such events. 
> - Analyzing the demographics (age, sex, race) of people involved in fatal accidents and using this information to develop campaigns geared towards high-risk demographic populations. 
> - Investigating relationships between contributing factors to accidents (such as drugs/alcohol use, speed limits, etc.) and fatality rates or types of vehicles involved in accidents to better inform public safety policy or vehicle safety regulations

### Acknowledgements
> If you use this dataset in your research, please credit the original authors.
> [Data Source](https://data.world/sarahcnyt)
> 
>


### License
> 
> 
> See the dataset description for more information.

### Columns

**File: person.csv**
| Column name    | Description                                                                                         |
|:---------------|:----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| **STATE**      | The state in which the accident occurred. (String)                                                  |
| **ST_CASE**    | The unique case number assigned to the accident. (Integer)                                          |
| **VE_FORMS**   | The number of vehicles involved in the accident. (Integer)                                          |
| **VEH_NO**     | The number of the vehicle involved in the accident. (Integer)                                       |
| **PER_NO**     | The number of people involved in the accident. (Integer)                                            |
| **STR_VEH**    | The type of vehicle involved in the accident. (String)                                              |
| **COUNTY**     | The county in which the accident occurred. (String)                                                 |
| **DAY**        | The day of the month on which the accident occurred. (Integer)                                      |
| **MONTH**      | The month in which the accident occurred. (Integer)                                                 |
| **HOUR**       | The hour of the day on which the accident occurred. (Integer)                                       |
| **MINUTE**     | The minute of the hour on which the accident occurred. (Integer)                                    |
| **RUR_URB**    | The rural or urban area in which the accident occurred. (String)                                    |
| **FUNC_SYS**   | The functional system of the road on which the accident occurred. (String)                          |
| **HARM_EV**    | The type of harm event that occurred. (String)                                                      |
| **MAN_COLL**   | The type of collision that occurred. (String)                                                       |
| **SCH_BUS**    | Whether or not a school bus was involved in the accident. (String)                                  |
| **MAKE**       | The make of the vehicle involved in the accident. (String)                                          |
| **MAK_MOD**    | The make and model of the vehicle involved in the accident. (String)                                |
| **BODY_TYP**   | The body type of the vehicle involved in the accident. (String)                                     |
| **MOD_YEAR**   | The model year of the vehicle involved in the accident. (Integer)                                   |
| **TOW_VEH**    | Whether or not the vehicle was towed from the scene of the accident. (String)                       |
| **SPEC_USE**   | The special use of the vehicle involved in the accident. (String)                                   |
| **EMER_USE**   | Whether or not the vehicle was being used for emergency purposes. (String)                          |
| **ROLLOVER**   | Whether or not the vehicle rolled over during the accident. (String)                                |
| **IMPACT1**    | The first point of impact of the vehicle involved in the accident. (String)                         |
| **FIRE_EXP**   | Whether or not the vehicle was involved in a fire. (String)                                         |
| **AGE**        | The age of the person involved in the accident. (Integer)                                           |
| **SEX**        | The gender of the person involved in the accident. (String)                                         |
| **PER_TYP**    | The type of person involved in the accident. (String)                                               |
| **INJ_SEV**    | The severity of the injury sustained by the person involved in the accident. (String)               |
| **SEAT_POS**   | The seating position of the person involved in the accident. (String)                               |
| **REST_USE**   | Whether or not the person involved in the accident was using a restraint device. (String)           |
| **REST_MIS**   | Whether or not the person involved in the accident was using a restraint device correctly. (String) |
| **AIR_BAG**    | Whether or not the vehicle involved in the accident had an airbag. (String)                         |
| **EJECTION**   | Whether or not the person involved in the accident was ejected from the vehicle. (String)           |
| **EJ_PATH**    | The path of the person involved in the accident who was ejected from the vehicle. (String)          |
| **EXTRICAT**   | Whether or not the person involved in the accident was extricated from the vehicle. (String)        |
| **DRINKING**   | Whether or not the person involved in the accident was drinking. (String)                           |
| **ALC_DET**    | The alcohol concentration detected in the person involved in the accident. (String)                 |
| **ALC_STATUS** | The alcohol status of the person involved in the accident. (String)                                 |
| **ATST_TYP**   | Type of Traffic Control at Scene of Accident (String)                                               |
| **ALC_RES**    | Alcohol Test Result (String)                                                                        |
| **DRUGS**      | Drug Test Given (String)                                                                            |
| **DRUG_DET**   | Drug Test Result (String)                                                                           |
| **DSTATUS**    | Drug Test Status (String)                                                                           |
| **DRUGTST1**   | Drug Test Type 1 (String)                                                                           |
| **DRUGTST2**   | Drug Test Type 2 (String)                                                                           |
| **DRUGTST3**   | Drug Test Type 3 (String)                                                                           |
| **DRUGRES1**   | Drug Test Result 1 (String)                                                                         |
| **DRUGRES2**   | Drug Test Result 2 (String)                                                                         |
| **DRUGRES3**   | Drug Test Result 3 (String)                                                                         |
| **HOSPITAL**   | Hospital to which Injured Person was Transported (String)                                           |
| **DOA**        | Date of Accident (Date)                                                                             |
| **DEATH_DA**   | Day of Death (Integer)                                                                              |
| **DEATH_MO**   | Month of Death (Integer)                                                                            |
| **DEATH_YR**   | Year of Death (Integer)                                                                             |
| **DEATH_HR**   | Hour of Death (Integer)                                                                             |
| **DEATH_MN**   | Minute of Death (Integer)                                                                           |
| **DEATH_TM**   | Time of Death (Time)                                                                                |
| **LAG_HRS**    | Hours between Accident and Death (Integer)                                                          |
| **SER_TR**     | Service Traction (String)                                                                           |
| **FUELCODE**   | Fuel Code (String)                                                                                  |
| **MCYCL_DS**   | Motorcycle Displacement (String)                                                                    |
| **CARBUR**     | Carburetion (String)                                                                                |
| **CYLINDER**   | Number of Cylinders (Integer)                                                                       |
| **DISPLACE**   | Displacement (String)                                                                               |
| **MCYCL_CY**   | Motorcycle Cylinder (String)                                                                        |
| **TIRE_SZE**   | Tire Size (String)                                                                                  |
| **TON_RAT**    | Ton Rating (String)                                                                                 |
| **TRK_WT**     | Truck Weight (Integer)                                                                              |
| **TRKWTVAR**   | Truck Weight Variation (String)                                                                     |
| **MCYCL_WT**   | Motorcycle Weight (Integer)                                                                         |
| **VIN_REST**   | Vehicle Identification Number Restraint (String)                                                    |
| **WHLDRWHL**   | Wheel Drive Wheel (String)                                                                          |
| **Year**       | Year of Accident (Integer)                                                                          |

_____

**File: accident.csv**
| Column name   | Description                                                                   |
|:--------------|:------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| **ST_CASE**   | The unique case number assigned to the accident. (Integer)                    |
| **VE_FORMS**  | The number of vehicles involved in the accident. (Integer)                    |
| **COUNTY**    | The county in which the accident occurred. (String)                           |
| **DAY**       | The day of the month on which the accident occurred. (Integer)                |
| **MONTH**     | The month in which the accident occurred. (Integer)                           |
| **HOUR**      | The hour of the day on which the accident occurred. (Integer)                 |
| **MINUTE**    | The minute of the hour on which the accident occurred. (Integer)              |
| **FUNC_SYS**  | The functional system of the road on which the accident occurred. (String)    |
| **HARM_EV**   | The type of harm event that occurred. (String)                                |
| **MAN_COLL**  | The type of collision that occurred. (String)                                 |
| **SCH_BUS**   | Whether or not a school bus was involved in the accident. (String)            |
| **VE_TOTAL**  | The total number of vehicles involved in the accident. (Integer)              |
| **PEDS**      | The number of pedestrians involved in the accident. (Integer)                 |
| **PERSONS**   | The total number of persons involved in the accident. (Integer)               |
| **CITY**      | The city in which the accident occurred. (String)                             |
| **YEAR**      | The year in which the accident occurred. (Integer)                            |
| **NHS**       | Whether or not the accident occurred on the National Highway System. (String) |
| **ROAD_FNC**  | The type of road on which the accident occurred. (String)                     |
| **RD_OWNER**  | The owner of the road on which the accident occurred. (String)                |
| **RELJCT2**   | The relation of the junction to the accident. (String)                        |
| **TYP_INT**   | The type of intersection at which the accident occurred. (String)             |
| **WRK_ZONE**  | Whether or not the accident occurred in a work zone. (String)                 |
| **REL_ROAD**  | The relation of the road to the accident. (String)                            |
| **LGT_COND**  | The light condition at the time of the accident. (String)                     |

### Acknowledgements
> If you use this dataset in your research, please credit the original authors.
> If you use this dataset in your research, please credit [Sarah Cohen](https://data.world/sarahcnyt).
